sentences.english: Can I talk to one of the best men?
sentences.chinese: 我可以跟伴郞之一說話嗎？

sentences.english: Sasae Weaver cattle days, on the ground, but I and Seoul.
sentences.chinese: 天有牛郞織女，地上金童玉女，唯吾與爾。

sentences.english: Qingyuan Xian year, Liu was awarded the Left is willing to Xiao Wei Lang will be.
sentences.chinese: 顯慶元年，劉仁願被授予左驍衛郞將。

sentences.english: The blond groom poured Lucy a glass of wine and smiled knowingly.
sentences.chinese: 金髮新郞給露西倒了一杯葡萄酒，心照不宣地微笑着。

sentences.english: My adoring bridegroom took the message to heart.
sentences.chinese: 我的讓人羨慕的新郞把這樣的信息放在了心裏。

sentences.english: Of all the mountains, Qomolangma reses the highest.
sentences.chinese: 所有的山之中，珠穆郞瑪聳立得最高。

sentences.english: He and other Chinese scholars downplay Li Yundi's and Lang Lang's stardom.
sentences.chinese: 他和其他中國學者並不看重李雲迪和郞朗的明星光環。

sentences.english: Ross , you were right . He should be your best man .
sentences.chinese: 你知道嗎？羅斯，你是對的他才應該當你的伴郞。

definition: (arch.) minister/official/noun prefix denoting function or status/a youth
(dialect) form of address for one's wife/polite form of address for a woman
son-in-law (used by wife's family)/uncle (husband of father's sister)
youngest brother/a period of two or three months
great uncle/grandfather's younger brother/husband's father's younger brother
father's sister's husband/husband of paternal aunt/uncle
barley/to moo/to seek or obtain/old variant of 侔[mou2]/old variant of 眸[mou2]
